videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 125 g (4.5 oz) (with battery and SD memory card)
focallength: 4.5-36.0 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-200 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
meteringmode: Matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
chargingtime: Approx. 2 h 50 min (when using Charging AC Adapter EH-70P and when no charge remains)
speed: 1/1500-1 s 4 s (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19, Charging AC Adapter EH-70P, USB Cable UC-E6, ViewNX 2 CD
continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous (the frame rate for continuous shooting is about 1.1 fps and the maximum number of continuous shots is about 6), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16
monitor: 6.7 cm (2.7-in.), approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
media: Internal memory (approx. 25 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-62G (available separately)
movierecordingactualbatterylifeforrecord: Approx. 45 min (720/30p) when using EN-EL19 Approx. 50 min (720/25p) when using EN-EL19
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 99% horizontal and 99% vertical (compared to actual image)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 1.5 m (5 ft) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 2 cm (0.8 in.) to infinity (wide-angle position) (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 97.1 x 57.9 x 19.9 mm (3.9 x 2.3 x 0.8 in.) (excluding projections)
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Sound files (Voice Memo): WAV Movies: AVI (Motion-JPEG compliant)
focusareaselection: Face priority, center, manual with 99 focus areas, subject tracking, target finding AF
whitebalance: Auto, Cloudy (Preset), Daylight / Sunny (Preset), Flash (Preset), Fluorescent (Preset), Incandescent (Preset)
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
shootingmodes: Scene auto selector, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Backlighting, Panorama assist, Pet portrait), Special effects, Smart portrait, Auto
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 97% horizontal and 97% vertical (compared to actual image)
flashfunctions: Auto Flash, Fill-in Flash, Flash Off
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 800 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
optionalaccessories: Battery Charger MH-66, AC Adapter EH-62G, Audio Video Cable EG-CP14
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CCD; total pixels: approx. 20.48 million
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 80-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
vibrationreduction: Lens shift (still pictures) Lens shift and electronic VR (movies)
